FuncDef:
The stopbits command configures the stop bit of a user interface.
The undo stopbits command restores the stop bit of a user interface. The stopbits command configures the stop bit of a user interface. The undo stopbits command restores the stop bit of a user interface. By default, the stop bit is 1 bit.
ParentView: CONSOLE-type user interface view,VTY-type user interface view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the stop bit.
The value is an enumerated type, which is 1.5, 1, 2.

ExtraInfo: If the stop bit of a user interface is 1 bit, the corresponding number of data bits is 8.If the stop bit of a user interface is 1.5 bits, the corresponding number of data bits is 5.If the stop bit of a user interface is 2 bits, the corresponding number of data bits is 6, 7, or 8.
